• Ridge confides in Quinn about his concerns regarding Thorne's intentions towards Brooke and his own plans to win her back.
• Thorne makes a passionate plea to Brooke, asking her to consider marrying him instead of Ridge, citing his own love and devotion to her.
</summary>

<summary>
* Nicole is trying to convince Mia to let her adopt her baby, but Mia wants to meet Nicole's fiancé first. Brady tries to help Nicole but ends up telling Mia the truth, that Nicole's fiancé doesn't know about the adoption. Nicole is furious with Brady and feels like he has ruined her chances with Mia.
* Lucas and Chloe are preparing for their engagement party, and Lucas's mother Kate is being overly generous with gifts. Chloe feels guilty about accepting the gifts and Lucas reassures her that she deserves them. Meanwhile, Daniel is struggling with his feelings for Chloe and tries to talk to her about it.
* John has decided to undergo hypnosis to try and recover his memories, and Marlena is supportive of his decision. However, she is also concerned that John may not be ready to face the truth about his past. Brady talks to Marlena about John's decision and she expresses her concerns to him.
* Chelsea is getting ready to attend Lucas and Chloe's engagement party and runs into Max, who offers to accompany her. Chelsea is hesitant at first but eventually agrees. Meanwhile, Daniel tries to convince Chloe to call off the engagement and be with him instead, but Chloe is torn between her feelings for Lucas and Daniel.</summary>

<summary>
* Abigail is struggling with her interactions with EJ DiMera, and her mother Jennifer is concerned about their relationship, warning Abigail to stay away from EJ. Meanwhile, Adrienne reveals to Jennifer that she has seen Abigail and EJ together on multiple occasions.
* Sami is trying to help her brother Eric, who is dealing with the aftermath of being drugged and accused of a crime. She confronts EJ, who claims to have had nothing to do with the DiMera family's plots, but Sami is skeptical.
* Nicole discovers a mysterious doctor, Chyka, in Daniel's apartment, and Chyka attacks her. Eric arrives and finds Nicole injured, and Chyka escapes.
* Kate is dealing with the fallout from Nick's disappearance and is trying to keep Gabi and Abigail from discovering the truth. She is also trying to manage Julie's concerns about Nick's whereabouts.
* Daniel's computer has been hacked, and all his files are gone. He enlists Ted's help to recover the data, and they discover that the virus is highly sophisticated. Meanwhile, Anne is trying to cause trouble for Daniel by filing a complaint against him, but Jennifer intervenes and puts a stop to it.
</summary>

<summary>
* Melanie is upset because her father is leaving town, and she doesn't know when he'll return. Gabi tries to comfort her, and they discuss the photo shoot Gabi did with Chad.
* Stefano offers to help Chad with his coffeehouse venture, but Chad declines, not wanting Stefano's involvement in his business.
* Kate and Sami discuss the success of the photo shoot with Gabi and Chad, and Kate wants to sign them as the new faces of Countess Wilhelmina.
* Madison offers Hope a modeling job, but Hope declines, feeling it's not who she is anymore. However, Bo thinks Madison's offer could be an opportunity to get to Stefano.
* Sami and Madison discuss their plan to sabotage Kate's company, Countess Wilhelmina, by feeding her false information and making her think she's ahead of the game.
* Chad and Melanie share a moment, but Melanie pulls back, feeling guilty about her feelings for Chad due to her friendship with Abigail.
* Hope and Bo set a trap for Stefano, using a woman named Carol to pose as a bank employee and get Stefano to reveal information about his safe deposit box.</summary>

<summary>
• Mimi confesses to Rex that she had an abortion without telling him she was pregnant, and she's afraid of losing him because of it. Rex is understanding and forgives her, but Jan threatens to reveal the secret to Rex if Mimi doesn't keep Belle away from Shawn.
• Belle is torn between her love for Shawn and her duty to Philip, who is on his way to war. Shawn convinces her to email Philip and tell him the truth about her feelings, but Jan tries to guilt trip her into staying with Philip.
• Meanwhile, Sami is stressed about her upcoming wedding to Lucas and is tempted by Brandon, who has returned to Salem. Eugenia and Kate are plotting against Sami, and Eugenia has drugged Brandon to make it look like Sami cheated on Lucas. John is struggling with his addiction and Kate is trying to help him, while also dealing with her own feelings about Sami and Lucas's wedding.</summary>

<summary>
• EJ and Sami have a tense conversation over the phone, with EJ wanting Sami to return home and Sami insisting on handling a business problem in Chicago. Meanwhile, Nick tries to make amends with Abigail, who is struggling with her feelings about her affair with EJ.

• JJ is dealing with his own issues, including a court hearing and his aunt Kayla's concerns about his involvement with Theresa. Kayla advises JJ to stay away from Theresa, who is trying to manipulate him.

• Brady and Theresa have a confrontation at his apartment, where Theresa reveals her true intentions and Brady warns her that Daniel is still in love with Jennifer. Theresa storms out, and Brady later runs into Jennifer and reassures her that everything will be okay with JJ's court hearing.

• Daniel and Nicole are working together to take down Chyka, who is hiding in a secluded location. They come up with a plan to sneak into the hideout, but Daniel is hesitant due to the risks involved.

• The episode ends with several cliffhangers, including Sami's surprise return to Salem, Nick's continued attempts to manipulate those around him, and Theresa's scheme to obtain gift cards using Abigail's name. Meanwhile, JJ is seen watching Theresa from afar, and Daniel and Nicole prepare to take action against Chyka.</summary>

<summary>
• Carly Manning is trapped in a basement by Vivian Alamain, who seeks revenge for Carly killing her loved one, Lawrence. Carly tries to escape and warns Bo about Vivian's plan to harm her daughter Melanie.
• Melanie is getting ready for her wedding to Philip Kiriakis, but she's having second thoughts and asks Stephanie to give a letter to Nathan Horton, her former love interest. However, Nathan refuses to read the letter.
• Meanwhile, Chloe Lane reveals to Daniel Jonas that she's pregnant, and they're both excited about the news. They decide to keep it a secret for now.
• Maggie Horton is struggling with her emotions on the anniversary of her husband Mickey's death and doesn't want to attend Melanie's wedding. However, Nathan convinces her to go, and she eventually opens up to her family and friends about her feelings.
• Vivian's plan to harm Melanie is still unclear, but it's hinted that she might have something to do with Melanie's wedding dress or the wedding ceremony itself. Victor Kiriakis is also involved in the situation, but his role is not fully understood.
• The wedding ceremony is about to start, but Melanie is still unsure about her feelings for Philip and Nathan. The scene ends with Carly's desperate attempt to escape and warn Melanie about Vivian's plan, while Melanie is getting ready to walk down the aisle.</summary>

<summary>
• Max is overwhelmed with work at the garage and is surprised when Abby shows up to help him, revealing that she has been learning about cars and is a talented mechanic. They bond over their shared experiences and Abby reveals that she had a crush on Max in the past, which he reciprocates, but feels it's too late due to their age difference and the fact that Abby is now in college.
• Chelsea is accused by her father Bo of working with Patrick Lockhart, which she denies, but Bo doesn't believe her and tells her to leave the house and never come back. Chelsea is devastated and feels unloved and unwanted, but her mother Billie reassures her that she loves her and believes in her.
• Nick is struggling to come to terms with Chelsea's rejection of him and feels guilty for deceiving her by pretending to be Dr. Shane Patton. Billie advises him to give Chelsea time and space, but also encourages him to fight for their relationship, revealing that Chelsea has feelings for him.
• Hope tries to mediate between Bo and Chelsea, arguing that Chelsea is trying to change and make amends for her past mistakes, but Bo is unwilling to forgive her and feels that she is a threat to their family. Meanwhile, Abby and Max grow closer, and Chelsea considers using a new job opportunity to make Nick jealous.</summary>

<summary>
• Lexie is having an affair with Tek, and they almost get caught by Abe, who is struggling with his night vision after surgery. Lexie tries to end the affair, but Tek convinces her to continue, saying Abe doesn't want her and can't fulfill her needs.

• Marlena is worried about John's threats against Alex, and Alex reassures her that he will take care of John and get a restraining order. Meanwhile, John is determined to stop Alex and protect Marlena, and Abe advises him to use his ISA training to gather evidence against Alex instead of resorting to violence.

• Philip gives a heartfelt speech at Shawn and Mimi's bridal shower, talking about how marriage and having a child with Belle has given his life new meaning. However, Mimi is struggling with her own secret: she knows that Shawn is the father of Belle's child, Claire, and feels guilty for not telling him.

• Belle wants to talk to Shawn alone and asks him to meet her on the roof, but he refuses. Meanwhile, Mimi decides to write Shawn a letter revealing the truth about Claire's paternity, which will change everything for the four of them.

• The episode ends with several cliffhangers, including Marlena's sudden declaration of love for John, Kate's plea to Victor to reconsider telling Shawn the truth about Claire's paternity, and Mimi's letter to Shawn that will reveal the secret that has been weighing on her conscience.</summary>

<summary>
• Marlena and John's relationship is put to the test as they disagree over Tony and the bug-sweeping device John planted in Marlena's purse, with Marlena feeling John is trying to control her and John accusing Tony of manipulating Marlena.
• Rex discovers the truth about his and Cassie's conception from Professor Rolf, who reveals that Stefano Dimera had him create the perfect twins through an experiment, and Rex is torn between his feelings about being an experiment and his pride in his superior intelligence.
• Meanwhile, other relationships in Salem are also heating up, including Roman and Kate, who share a passionate moment, and Shawn-D and Belle, who work on rebuilding their relationship and learning to communicate effectively, while also dealing with the challenges of their own feelings and desires.</summary>

<summary>
* Chelsea is in the hospital after passing out, and the doctors are running tests to determine the cause of her illness, which they suspect may be a complication from her recent surgery. Meanwhile, her family and friends are worried about her and trying to stay positive.
* Ava is holding Steve, Kayla, Bo, and Hope hostage, and has revealed that she plans to keep them captive for nine months, during which time Kayla will give birth to a baby that Ava claims is hers. Ava is seeking revenge against Steve for leaving her at the altar and is determined to make him and his friends pay for their perceived wrongs.</summary>

<summary>
• Stefano reveals to EJ that Rafael, the orderly from the asylum, has escaped but fell off a cliff and is dead, which EJ finds convenient and tidy. Meanwhile, Ciara and Theo are found safe and sound by Bo and Hope, and Rafe 2 is revealed to have found them by tracking a lead about a runaway girl who saw them.

• Nicole discovers a DNA report that she believes will prove EJ and Stefano kidnapped Rafe and took over his mind, and she confides in Chloe about her theory. However, Chloe is skeptical and advises Nicole to be careful and forget about the whole thing.

• EJ tells Taylor that he is divorcing Nicole because he loves Taylor, but Taylor is hesitant and feels guilty about being the reason for the divorce. EJ insists that he is doing the right thing and that Nicole will be better off without him.

• Stefano tries to convince Abigail to persuade Chad to work for him at DiMera Enterprises, and Kate helps Stefano by manipulating Chad into changing his mind about working at the hospital. Meanwhile, Bo and Hope are reunited with Ciara, and Rafe 2 is thanked for finding the kids.

• Taylor finally admits her love for EJ, and they share a moment together. Meanwhile, Nicole decides to surprise EJ at home, unaware of his plans to divorce her. The episode ends with EJ about to reveal something important to someone, and Carly mentioning that she's in big trouble.</summary>

<summary>
• Jack returns home to his family, and they celebrate Abigail's birthday together, with Jack struggling to adjust to the changes that have occurred during his absence.
• Belle and Mimi discuss their concerns about Shawn, Brady, and Rex, who have gone to rescue Philip, and their worries about Kate's reaction to their relationships.
• Roman and Marlena are reunited with John and Kate, who are shocked to see them alive, and they begin to explain their story of being held captive by Tony DiMera.
• Hope is worried about Bo, who has gone with Billie to investigate a lead on their daughter Georgia's disappearance, and she fears that something is wrong.
• Bo and Billie search an empty house, where they find a clue that suggests Georgia is alive, but they are ambushed, and Billie is taken.
• Jack is reunited with his family and is happy to be home, but he becomes jealous when he learns that Jennifer has been spending time with Patrick Lockhart.
• Jennifer tries to reassure Jack that she only cares about him and that Patrick was just a friend, but Jack is still insecure.
• Bo searches for Billie and finds a doll with a note that suggests Georgia is in trouble, and he realizes that someone else is in the house.
• The scene ends with Bo calling out for Billie, who has been taken, and the sound of a child's voice saying "Mama."
• Meanwhile, Brady, Lucas, and Rex are on a mission to rescue Philip, and they are shown parachuting into the unknown.
</summary>

<summary>
* Paul and Sonny discuss their investigation into Deimos' activities, with Paul revealing that he obtained information from a charter pilot about Deimos' flight to Manitoba, Canada.
* Brady and Nicole share a romantic moment, discussing their future and the possibility of having dogs, but their happiness is short-lived as a mysterious figure appears, working for Deimos.
* Abigail and Gabi have a heated conversation about Chad, with Gabi trying to convince Abigail to work on her marriage and Abigail explaining that she can't be with someone who has feelings for someone else.
* Steve and Kayla try to connect with Tripp, but he struggles to forgive Steve for killing his mother, Ava, and eventually leaves the dinner gathering.
* Sonny discovers that Deimos is in Manitoba, Canada, and is coming for Brady and Nicole, prompting him to fly to Canada to warn them.
* Nicole is confronted by a masked figure working for Deimos, who demands to know where Brady is, and Brady tries to reason with the figure, offering him money in exchange for leaving them alone.
* The situation escalates, and Brady is shot by the masked figure, leaving Nicole devastated and desperate to save him.
* The episode ends with the revelation that the masked figure is Xander, a surprise twist that adds to the drama and tension of the storyline.
</summary>

<summary>
* Roman tries to reach Kate, but she's not at her office or answering her cell phone, and John knows where she is but won't tell Roman.
* Belle calls Marlena, saying something bad happened at Cassie's party at the Dimera mansion, and Bo and Hope are there.
* At the mansion, Bo is investigating an incident where Shawn's drink was tainted with a toxic substance, and Chaz is suspected of being involved.
* Tony returns home and is furious with Cassie for throwing a party and inviting Chaz, who is a friend of the alleged drug dealer Vin Ramsell.
* Bo tries to get Chaz to cooperate and tell him what he knows about Vin Ramsell, who is still on the loose.
* Lucas and Sami have a confrontation at her apartment, where she accuses him of being a coward and he teases her about being scared of a potential intruder.
* Rex and Mimi discuss their relationship and Rex's accelerated intelligence, with Mimi expressing her concerns about being able to keep up with him.
* The police investigation continues, with Bo determined to catch Vin Ramsell and bring him to justice for trying to kill his son Shawn.
</summary>

<summary>
* Daniel and Maxine discuss their day, and Maxine mentions that Jennifer will be in shortly, but Anne Milbauer is not there, which is unusual.
* Kristen visits Eric to discuss the upcoming wedding and tries to get a rise out of him by mentioning his mother, Marlena, but Eric remains calm and advises her that true repentance must come before absolution.
* John reveals to Nicole that he plans to seduce Kristen before the wedding to open Brady's eyes to who she really is, but Nicole warns him that this will cost him his relationship with Marlena and Brady.
* Abe asks Daniel to check in on his friend Jarrod Grant, who is in the hospital for tests, and Daniel agrees to help.
* Anne confronts Jennifer about her behavior at the hospital, but Daniel intervenes and warns Anne to back off, revealing that he knows about her past misdeeds.
* Kristen discusses her plans for revenge against Marlena with Stefano, who advises her to focus on the present rather than seeking revenge.
* Brady surprises Kristen with adoption papers, revealing that he has arranged for them to be fast-tracked, and Kristen is overwhelmed with emotion.
* The episode ends with John vowing to take action against Kristen, while Victor advises Marlena to accept that she has lost John and move on before things get worse.</summary>

<summary>
*Kate and Lucas discuss Sheryl, and Lucas is upset that Kate used her for her own gain. Kate reveals that Jordan is leaving Salem, but it's later revealed that Jordan has decided to stay for Rafe.
*Ben and Abigail have a conversation, and Ben warns her to stay away from Nick. Abigail confides in Will about her problems, but doesn't reveal what's going on.
*Sonny and Will discuss their plan to deal with Nick, who is trying to gain custody of Ari. Sonny reveals that he has a gun and is willing to use it to protect Will and Ari.
*Julie tries to talk to Nick about his problems and suggests that he seek professional help. Nick breaks down and admits that he's struggling with his demons.
*Sami and EJ discuss their plan to deal with Nick, and Sami is struggling with the moral implications of their actions. EJ tries to reassure her that it's necessary to protect their family.
*Kate reveals to Sonny that Gabi has a court date next week to discuss custody of Ari. Sonny is upset that Gabi didn't tell him about the court date.
*Will receives a call from Sonny about the court date and is furious. Abigail tries to comfort him, but he's too upset to talk.
*Nick calls Marlena and asks for her help in finding a therapist. He admits that he's struggling with his demons and wants to change.
*The scene ends with Nick being shot in Horton Square, and Julie calling for an ambulance. Rafe arrives on the scene and tries to comfort Julie, who is distraught over Nick's condition.</summary>

<summary>
• The scene opens with Lucas trying to convince Sami to attend her mother Marlena's funeral, but Sami is resistant, believing her mother is not really dead.
• Meanwhile, Belle is struggling to come to terms with her mother's death and is worried about Shawn, who is not present at the funeral.
• It is revealed that Shawn is being held captive by Jan, who is trying to keep him from Belle and is using drugs to control him.
• Nicole is trying to get Jan to give her money to bail out her friend Crystal, who is threatening to reveal Nicole's involvement in Marlena's death.
• At the funeral, John gives a eulogy, and Belle and Hope share their memories of Marlena.
• Sami is overcome with grief and anger, blaming John, Kate, and Bo for her mother's death.
• As the funeral comes to a close, Celeste claims that Marlena's spirit is trying to communicate with them, and Sami begins to suspect that her mother may not be dead after all.
• In a shocking twist, Sami hears her mother's voice, and it is revealed that Marlena may be alive.
• The episode ends with a cliffhanger, as Sami tries to process what she has just heard, and Jan threatens to teach Nicole a lesson for lying to her.
</summary>

<summary>
• Nick Fallon discovers that his friend Max altered his alternative fuel source proposal without his knowledge, leading to a heated argument and Nick's decision to return the grant money, feeling that Max deserves the credit.
• Meanwhile, Philip Kiriakis is dealing with the aftermath of a warehouse fire that destroyed John Black's shipment, with both men accusing each other of being responsible for the arson.
• Ava Vitali, a friend of John's, offers her support and advice, while also warning Morgan to stay away from Philip due to the feud between Philip and John.
• Max struggles with his own secrets, including his exceptional intelligence and his desire to keep it hidden, leading to tension with his friends and family, particularly Nick and his sister Stephanie.
• The episode ends with several cliffhangers, including Philip's denial of involvement in the warehouse fire, Lucas's mysterious behavior, and Ava's warning to John to take care of his business, as well as a surprise appearance by Marlena, who reveals that she advised John not to fight back against Philip.</summary>

<summary>
* Chloe is hesitant to tell Daniel about her infidelity, fearing it will make him want to leave her, but she's reassured by her conversation with Melanie, who eventually warms up to Chloe and lends her a family heirloom for the wedding.
* The Horton family is gathering to say goodbye to Alice, who is nearing the end of her life, and they're sharing fond memories and stories about her.
* Stefano returns Madeline's safe deposit box contents, including personal documents, and assures her he hasn't read or tampered with them.
* Kate discovers a mysterious item that could potentially incriminate her and Stefano, but they decide to return it to Madeline and cut ties with her.
* Chad decides to stay in Salem and attend Salem University, which pleases Mia, but his mother Madeline is still trying to persuade him to leave.
* Lucas tries to convince Will to move out of the DiMera mansion, citing Alice's disapproval, but Will is hesitant to leave his siblings.
* The wedding ceremony between Daniel and Chloe is interrupted by a phone call, and just as it's about to resume, Carly arrives and announces she has something important to say, potentially disrupting the proceedings again.
</summary>

<summary>
* Hope and Aiden plan a trip to the Green Mountain Lodge, which Hope describes as an escape from the craziness and distractions in Salem, and Aiden agrees to go, seeing it as a chance to rekindle their relationship.
* Ciara interviews for a volunteer position at Shady Hills, a psychiatric hospital where Abigail is being held, and is offered the job, which she sees as an opportunity to get her life back on track.
* Abigail is struggling with her mental health and is worried about being sent to a state asylum if she is found to have started a fire, and Chad is planning to break her out of Shady Hills.
* Rafe is unhappy about Hope's decision to go away with Aiden and expresses his concerns to her, but ultimately agrees to cover for her at work.
* Chase is in a psychiatric hospital, where he is undergoing therapy and trying to come to terms with his past actions, and Aiden is trying to support him.
* Adriana is causing tension in the Hernandez household, particularly with Blanca, who is trying to navigate her feelings for Rafe.
* Monahan arrives at the police station and claims to have information about Stefano DiMera's death, which sparks the interest of Roman and Rafe.
</summary>

<summary>
*Abe agrees to perform the ceremony for Sami and EJ's wedding, which will be a surprise to Sami.
*Abigail is overwhelmed with planning Sami's wedding and feels like she's being taken advantage of, but Sami reassures her that she's grateful for her help.
*Paige's mom, Eve, arrives in Salem and meets JJ, but Paige is nervous about her mom finding out about JJ's past.
*JJ is worried about Eve discovering his criminal record and is unsure how she will react.
*Eve is cautious about JJ and warns Paige to be careful around him, but agrees to give him a chance.
*Jordan and Rafe are still not talking, and Kate tries to convince Jordan to reach out to Rafe and help him through his struggles.
*Ben is trying to reassure Jordan that they are safe in Salem, but Jordan is still worried about being found out.
*Sami is trying to keep her cool while dealing with Kate and Abigail, but is clearly stressed about the wedding and her relationships with those around her.
*Eve discovers that JJ's last name is Deveraux, which seems to be a surprise to her, and her reaction is unclear.</summary>

<summary>
• Kate visits Victor to offer condolences for Caroline's death, but Victor is still grieving the loss of his chance to be with Caroline, the love of his life.
• Xander is revealed to be working with Nicole, and they are holding Ted Laurent captive, with Xander ordered to kill Ted for knowing too much about their plans.
• Sami confronts Nicole about blaming Eric for Holly's death, but Nicole refuses to forgive Eric and claims she will never love him again.
• Rex and Sarah decide to get married immediately, with Eric agreeing to perform the ceremony despite his own complicated feelings about love and relationships.
• Hope searches for Ted and discovers that his phone is ringing in Nicole's room, leading her to suspect that Nicole is hiding something.
• Brady tries to convince Nicole to work for Titan instead of Dimera, but she declines, and Brady also turns down her suggestion of rekindling their romance, citing his loyalty to Eric.
• Kate offers to snoop around Nicole's room to uncover any secrets she may be hiding, and Victor agrees, concerned about Nicole's influence on his grandson.
• The episode ends with Xander deciding to spare Ted's life and giving him a necklace to give to Sarah, while Nicole is shown to be hiding a secret, and Sami remains determined to uncover the truth about Nicole's actions.</summary>

<summary>
* Hope and Marlena discuss Ben Weston's mental fitness, with Hope wanting Marlena to retract her assessment and send Ben to Shady Hills, but Marlena believes Ben can lead a productive life with therapy and medication.
* Chad confides in Gabi about his struggles with Abigail's pregnancy with Stefan's child, and Gabi offers her support as a friend, but JJ becomes suspicious of their conversation.
* Abigail tells Stefan that she plans to shut him out of her life and the baby's life for the next six months, but Stefan insists that he will be a part of the baby's life.
* Ben tries to convince Ciara that he did not set the fire that almost killed her, claiming that he was hypnotized and remembers the night clearly, but Tripp is skeptical and hostile towards Ben.
* Lani and Eli discuss their feelings about their stillborn son, David, and Lani becomes emotional, but Eli tries to comfort her, leading to a misunderstanding about his intentions.
* Chad talks to Marlena about his feelings of inadequacy and jealousy towards Stefan, and Marlena suggests that he try to open his heart to the baby as Abigail has done.
* The episode ends with Ben being summoned by Hope, who has a plan to deal with him, while Abigail experiences pain and discomfort due to the baby kicking, and Stefan offers his support, but Abigail rejects him.</summary>

<summary>
• Marlena's wedding to John is interrupted by Sami, who claims that someone is going to kill Marlena, but her warnings are dismissed as the result of her own instability.
• Meanwhile, Will is struggling with memories of his past, particularly his wedding to Sonny, which he had previously forgotten due to amnesia.
• Sonny confronts Will about his memories, and Will eventually reveals that he has remembered their wedding and his love for Sonny.
• Kristen DiMera, presumed dead, appears at the wedding and reveals that she has been seeking revenge against Marlena, who she claims pushed her out of a window and left her for dead.
• Kristen's true intentions are revealed, and she takes the wedding guests hostage, threatening to kill Marlena and John unless Sami kills John.
• Kristen reveals that EJ, Sami's presumed dead husband, is actually alive, and offers to take Sami to him if she kills John.
• The scene ends with Sami being pressured by Kristen to pull the trigger, while Eric and Marlena try to intervene and stop her.</summary>

<summary>
• JJ reveals to Jennifer that Paige knows he's working undercover for the DEA to take down Kyle, and he's trying to protect her from Kyle's dealings.
• Adrienne receives a letter from Sonny, who is struggling with his feelings for Will and missing Arianna.
• Abigail confesses to Chad that the baby she's carrying is actually his, not Ben's, and she loves him.
• Caroline is convinced by her friends to join the Salem bicentennial celebration committee and help with the planning.
• Eve tries to warn Paige about JJ's undercover work and the danger Kyle poses, but Paige refuses to listen.
• Kyle promotes JJ to a higher position in his organization, but JJ is actually working to take him down.
• Aiden surprises Hope with a romantic gesture and thanks her for including him in her life and making him a part of the bicentennial celebration.
• Paul and Will have a tense conversation about Sonny's departure, with Paul trying to apologize and Will blaming him for the breakdown of his marriage.
• Adrienne and Lucas share a romantic moment after their night of bungee jumping, and Adrienne expresses her desire to move on with her life and explore new experiences with Lucas.
• Eve and Justin have a chance encounter at a bar, and Eve tries to flirt with him, but Justin seems hesitant to engage.
</summary>

<summary>
* Will receives a call from his dad, who is on his way to Salem after learning about his mother's surgery, and Will is worried about potential complications.
* Vivian, who had been presumed dead, is revealed to be alive and is trying to get information about Kate Dimera's condition after she was shot.
* Eve is trying to get in touch with Stefan Dimera to offer her help with the company, and she runs into Vivian, who is not interested in talking to her.
* Jack and Jennifer are trying to find Dr. Rolf, who has gone missing after his lab was destroyed, and they suspect that Eve may be responsible.
* Brady is struggling with his feelings for Kristen, who is trying to seduce him, but he is resisting her advances.
* Nicole and Xander have a conversation about their past and their feelings for each other, and Nicole asks Xander to sign divorce papers.
* Eric is talking to Sarah, who is trying to tell him something, but she is interrupted by Sonny, who comes to talk to Eric about Kate's condition.
* Xander reveals that he has feelings for Sarah, who is still in love with Eric, and Nicole is skeptical of Xander's intentions.
* Brady is tempted by Kristen's advances, but he is trying to resist her and maintain his sobriety.
* The episode ends with several cliffhangers, including Kristen's vow to continue pursuing Brady, Xander's revelation that Sarah is pregnant, and Jennifer's determination to confront Eve about her actions.
</summary>

<summary>
• JJ is shot by Orpheus and is found by Gabi and Chad, who call for help and try to keep him stable until the ambulance arrives.
• Marlena, a psychiatrist, uses her medical knowledge to relieve the pressure on JJ's collapsed lung and help him breathe.
• Meanwhile, Steve and John work together to capture Orpheus, who has taken John hostage and planted a bomb at the pub.
• Orpheus is eventually subdued and taken into custody, and the bomb is defused.
• Adrienne is reunited with Justin, who had been worried about her safety and snuck into the hospital to check on her.
• Justin and Adrienne have a heart-to-heart conversation, during which Justin expresses his concern for her and Adrienne reveals that she still cares about him.
• Orpheus is brought to the hospital for medical treatment, where he attempts to escape and takes Marlena hostage.
• Orpheus ultimately takes a sedative from Marlena's bag and dies, and Marlena is shaken but unharmed.
• JJ undergoes surgery and is in a coma, but the doctors are hopeful for his recovery, and his loved ones gather around him to offer support and encouragement.
</summary>

<summary>
* Eli fills in for Sonny at Arianna's school event, and Gabi thanks him for making her daughter happy.
* Rafe arrives at the police station, injured from a run-in with a perp, and Gabi teases him about being late.
* Kate tries to convince Chad to tell Abigail that Theo is working for her, but Chad is hesitant due to Abigail's loyalty to Andre.
* Jennifer apologizes to Kate for a recent article and asks for a statement about the troubles at Dimera, but Kate refuses and suggests Jennifer talk to Abigail, the new head of PR.
* Victor tells Eve that he wants her to leave the Kiriakis mansion, but Eve reveals that she is the new CEO of Basic Black, thanks to Deimos' bequest.
* Brady tries to provoke Eric into a fight, but Jennifer intervenes, and Brady leaves to deal with a phone call.
* Gabi and Eli share a moment, and Eli thanks Gabi for a surprise lunchbox she prepared for him.
* Kate offers to buy Gabi Chic and fold it into Countess W, but Gabi is hesitant due to rumors about Dimera's financial troubles and her past issues with Chad.
* Victor demotes Brady as CEO of Titan and assigns him to deal with Eve, who is now in control of Basic Black, and threatens to fire him if he fails.
* Brady plots to take down Eve, and Rafe and Eli receive a lead on a case, while Abigail starts her new job as head of PR at Dimera and Kate asks her to deal with a press situation involving her mother, Jennifer.
</summary>

<summary>
• Sheila apologizes to Abe for not showing up to work due to food poisoning, and Abe forgives her and allows her to keep her job.
• Paul tells Brady that he confronted Will about his feelings for Sonny and set him free, and Brady is supportive of Paul's decision.
• Marlena is being released from the hospital and John is excited to take her home, but Will interrupts with news that he and Paul have broken up.
• Tripp confesses to Ciara that he framed Ben for the fire, and Ciara is furious with him for lying to her and manipulating her feelings.
• Ben discovers that Claire knew about Tripp's plan to frame him and confronts her about it, but Claire tries to downplay her involvement.
• Valerie tells Abe that she has been offered a job as chief of staff at her old hospital in D.C. and wants to know if he would consider moving with her, but Abe is hesitant to leave his job as mayor.
• Paul tells John and Brady that he is leaving Salem to move to California and participate in an experimental program that could help him walk again.
• Ciara confronts Tripp about his lies and manipulation, and they break up, while Ben tries to comfort Ciara but she is not ready to talk to him.
• Paul says goodbye to his family and friends as he prepares to leave Salem, and John is proud of the man Paul has become and the progress he has made in his life.
</summary>

<summary>
• Abe and Valerie go on a dinner date, but Theo is suspicious of Valerie's intentions and discovers that she lied about her whereabouts, leading him, Claire, and Ciara to investigate her further. Meanwhile, Gabi decides to give JJ another chance, and Chad is left to process his feelings for Gabi, who he believes is the only person he can be with now that Abigail is presumed dead.
• Sonny locks his parents and Lucas in a room to help them figure out their feelings for each other, while Paul and Steve investigate a shipment from Eduardo Hernandez, which they discover contains counterfeit designer handbags, leaving them to wonder why Eduardo kept it a secret. Abigail, who is alive and in hiding, is torn between revealing herself to Chad and staying hidden to avoid hurting him again.</summary>

<summary>
• It's New Year's Eve in Salem, and the residents are celebrating with parties and gatherings. Sami and Rafe are having a quiet night in, while Melanie and Philip are planning to elope to Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Nathan is trying to stop them, convinced that Melanie is making a mistake.
• Carly Manning is struggling with a dark secret, and Vivian Alamain is determined to expose her. Vivian has discovered that Carly killed Lawrence, and she's planning to use this information to destroy Carly's life.
• Daniel is trying to help Carly, but she's pushing him away. He's also dealing with his own feelings for Chloe, who is trying to get him to open up about his past.
• Hope and Justin are searching for evidence of Vivian's plans, and they discover a puzzle box that may hold the key to unlocking her secrets.
• As the night wears on, tensions rise between the characters. Nathan and Philip get into a fight, while Melanie tries to convince Stephanie that she's making the right decision by marrying Philip.
• The episode ends with Carly trapped in a coffin, Vivian's revenge plan coming to fruition. Sami receives a mysterious text from EJ, asking her to meet him without telling Rafe. The stage is set for a dramatic and intense new year in Salem.
</summary>

<summary>
• Luke Spencer is recovering in the hospital after a health scare, and his family is visiting him, including his wife Tracy, son Lucky, and daughter Lulu. Meanwhile, Ernesto, an old friend, brings Luke a gift of Cuban cigars, which Luke is eager to enjoy despite his doctor's orders.
• Alexis Davis has been nominated for Litigator of the Year and is seeking advice on what to wear to the awards dinner. She visits Maxie Jones at the fashion boutique, and they discuss various dress options. Meanwhile, Carly Corinthos serves Alexis with a notice to vacate the premises due to unpaid rent.
• Jason Morgan is trying to locate Sonny Corinthos, who has been arrested in New York City for assault. Jason enlists the help of Spinelli, who tries to hack into the NYPD database to find Sonny's location. Meanwhile, Ric Lansing offers to help Skye Chandler Quartermaine broker the sale of her waterfront properties, but Skye is hesitant due to Ric's history of revenge against his brother Sonny.</summary>

<summary>
• The scene begins with a christening ceremony for Josslyn Jacks, where various characters are in attendance, but Dominic and Sonny are noticeably absent. Meanwhile, Sonny is shown to be holding Dominic at gunpoint, and it is revealed that Dominic's real name is Dante Falconeri, and he is the son of Sonny and Olivia Falconeri.
• As the ceremony continues, Olivia receives news that Dante has been shot, and she rushes to his side. Sonny also arrives at the hospital, where he learns that Dante is his son and is fighting for his life. Robin and Patrick are called in to assist with Dante's care.
• The story unfolds with various characters discussing the events of the day, including the christening and Dante's shooting. Carly and Jax are shown to be enjoying the celebration, while Michael and Kristina are concerned about their father's absence. Meanwhile, Jason and Sam are dealing with Molly's attempts to get them to consider marriage.
• The episode ends with Sonny reflecting on his actions and realizing that he has made a grave mistake by shooting his own son. Olivia is shown to be by Dante's side, trying to keep him calm and focused on his recovery. The scene also cuts to a DVD that Morgan and Molly are watching, which appears to be a message from Franco, a character who is not present in the scene.</summary>

<summary>
• Jason Morgan is approached by Claudia Zacchara, who proposes a truce between their families and offers to bring down Trevor Lansing in exchange for Sonny's cooperation.
• Meanwhile, Sonny Corinthos is holding Johnny Zacchara captive, accusing him of being involved in the disappearance of his son Michael.
• Lulu Spencer is torn between her feelings for Logan Hayes, who is in a coma, and Johnny Zacchara, and seeks advice from her brother Lucky.
• Nikolas Cassadine is trying to remember the events surrounding Emily's murder with the help of Nadine, and eventually recalls that Diego Alcazar was the killer.
• Sam McCall is being held captive by Diego, who is taunting her and planning to kill her.
• Epiphany Johnson is persuaded to join a "Go Red for Women" support group for heart disease survivors, where she opens up about her experiences.
• Maxie Jones and Spinelli are investigating the text message killer and discover a cryptic clue left behind by Coop, which they hope will lead them to the killer.
• The scene ends with Nikolas revealing that he knows Diego was Emily's killer, and Diego responding with a menacing tone.</summary>

<summary>
• Johnny is questioned by Lucky about a mask, and Johnny claims he's never seen it before, despite Lucky's evidence that Johnny wore it while trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office.
• Maxie discusses her attraction to Johnny with Spinelli, citing his willingness to stand up for what he believes in, despite the danger posed by Sonny.
• Jason is concerned about a picture of Franco that appeared in Josslyn's christening album, and he asks Spinelli to investigate and track down Franco.
• Claire Walsh, a federal prosecutor, informs Sonny that she plans to send him to prison with Dante's help.
• Sonny tries to appeal to Dante's emotions, but Dante remains resolute in his decision to testify against Sonny.
• Luke advises Sonny to keep Ethan out of the conflict with Johnny Zacchara, and Sonny agrees to protect Ethan.
• Michael is struggling with the guilt of his role in Claudia's death and the fact that his father is taking the fall for him.
• Elizabeth is considering raising her children on her own, but Nikolas wants to provide financial support and be involved in the child's life.
• Lucky tries to warn Ethan about the dangers of getting involved with Johnny Zacchara, and he offers to help Ethan leave the country.
• Dante visits Michael and tries to convince him to tell the truth about Claudia's death, but Michael remains loyal to their father and refuses to cooperate.
</summary>

<summary>
• Todd Manning attempts to kill Sonny Corinthos, believing he is responsible for the death of his granddaughter and her father, but is stopped by Lieutenant John McBain and his daughter Starr, who tries to reason with him.
• Starr confronts Sonny, accusing him of killing her family and vowing to prove it, while Sonny maintains his innocence and claims Anthony Zacchara is the one who lied to her.
• Meanwhile, Maxie Jones is struggling to cope with the loss of her cousin Robin Scorpio Drake and is approached by Dr. Ewen Keenan, who offers to help her deal with her grief, but Maxie is hesitant to open up.
• Johnny Zacchara tries to manipulate Kate Howard into helping him take down Sonny, but Kate is resistant, and Johnny eventually turns his attention to Connie, who is willing to help him get revenge on Sonny.</summary>

<summary>
* The scene revolves around a bomb threat at the hospital, where Jason and Curtis work together to disarm the bomb, while Sam and others wait anxiously outside. Meanwhile, Olivia Jerome is revealed to be the one who planted the bomb and is also holding Alexis captive, seeking revenge against Julian for the death of her loved one, Duke.
* The episode also explores the aftermath of Morgan's death, with Carly seeking revenge against Olivia and Sonny struggling to come to terms with his past mistakes. Additionally, Finn's addiction is revealed, and he begins his journey towards recovery with Hayden's support. The episode ends with a cliffhanger, as Julian tries to save Alexis from Olivia's clutches.</summary>

<summary>
* The scenes depict various characters dealing with their personal struggles and conflicts, including Michael and Abby's situation with Brandon, who was released on bail after attempting to rape Abby, and Luke's guilt over hitting and killing Jake with his car.
* Other characters, such as Sonny, Brenda, and Carly, are also dealing with their own issues, including their relationships and the aftermath of Jake's death, while Patrick and Robin are trying to move forward with their lives and rebuild their relationship.
* Meanwhile, Theo and Suzanne are revealed to be hiding a secret about Brenda's son, who is believed to be dead, and are planning to raise him together without Brenda's knowledge, adding a new layer of complexity to the storyline.</summary>

<summary>
* The scenes depict various characters dealing with their personal struggles and relationships, including Jason and Sam discussing the possibility of having a baby, Carly and Jax's custody battle over Josslyn, Brenda's difficulties adjusting to motherhood with Alec, and Kristina's secret about taking hydrocodone.
* Other characters, such as Shawn, Alexis, and Sonny, become entangled in these storylines, offering support, advice, and sometimes causing tension, as they navigate their own relationships and challenges, including Lisa's sinister plot against Robin and Michael's concerns about Kristina's well-being.</summary>

<summary>
* Jason and Sam discuss the possibility that Nikolas staged his own death to escape his problems, and they suspect that Hayden may have been the intended target of the setup. Meanwhile, a warrant is issued for Jason's arrest, and he and Sam go into hiding to clear his name.
* Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot his ex-wife's lover in a fit of jealousy, and Maxie is torn between her love for Nathan and her shock and disappointment at his secret. Meanwhile, Lucas tries to remember the details of his attack, and the police investigation into the incident continues.
* Elizabeth considers teaming up with Franco to take down Hayden, while Hayden's mother Naomi arrives in town and reveals that she is searching for a valuable diamond necklace that Hayden's husband Nikolas sold. Naomi also seems to have a connection to Elizabeth, but the nature of their relationship is unclear.</summary>

<summary>
*Nikolas breaks up with Rebecca, citing that he can't be with her because she's Emily's twin and it's unfair to both of them.
*Carly wants to accompany Michael to his physical therapy session, but Michael insists on going alone, feeling that Carly is being overprotective.
*Claudia asks her uncle Rudy to make sure Jason doesn't come back alive from his mission to deal with some of Zacchara's old lieutenants who are threatening to break away from the Corinthos organization.
*Andrea Floyd, the mayor's wife, tries to persuade Patrick to settle the malpractice suit out of court to avoid a scandal that could ruin her husband's career and reputation.
*Olivia confides in Carly about her relationship with Johnny Zacchara and how Sonny is not happy about it, asking Carly to talk to Johnny and warn him about Sonny's potential reaction.
*Nikolas is struggling with his feelings for Rebecca and his memories of Emily, and Monica tries to advise him not to use Emily's memory as an excuse to shut out the world.
*Rebecca and Ethan are planning a high-stakes poker game, and Elizabeth suspects that Rebecca is cheating on Nikolas with Ethan.
*Claudia asks Johnny to help her get rid of Jason by letting him get ambushed when they go to meet the lieutenants, but Johnny is hesitant to get involved.</summary>

<summary>
• Maxie's health is deteriorating, and her heart is failing, while Georgie is recovering from surgery and eventually wakes up to say goodbye to her sister, but refuses to accept Maxie's impending death. Meanwhile, Nikolas and Emily are trying to work through their issues, and Emily decides to take a step forward by making love to Nikolas, hoping it will help her heal from her past trauma.
• Sonny is dealing with trust issues with Reese, who has lied to him multiple times, and he demands honesty from her, while Ric is being questioned by Jason about his involvement in Evan's death, and Ric insists that his story is true, but Jason remains skeptical, and Carly is still wary of Reese and her intentions, while Lorenzo tries to reassure her that he trusts her instincts.</summary>

<summary>
* Patrick and Robin take care of Elizabeth's baby Jake, with Patrick struggling to change his diaper and feed him, but eventually succeeding with Robin's help.
* Carly and Jax discuss the possibility of her being pregnant, with Jax pushing for her to take a home pregnancy test, but Carly is hesitant and worried about the timing given her son Michael's current condition.
* Maxie and Johnny are stuck in an elevator together, and Maxie tries to flirt with him and convince him to leave Lulu, but Johnny is resistant and loyal to Lulu.
* Lulu has a confrontation with Logan, who warns her about the dangers of the Zacchara family and tries to convince her to leave Johnny, but Lulu is not interested.
* Jason and Claudia discuss Spinelli's fever and Claudia's concerns about Sonny's behavior, with Spinelli warning Jason about an impending conflict with Sonny.
* Kate and Sonny discuss their engagement and the possibility of a prenuptial agreement, with Kate explaining that she wants to protect her assets in case Sonny's past catches up with him, but Sonny is hesitant and feels that it's not romantic.</summary>

<summary>
• Tracy insists on accompanying Luke on his mission to find Jerry Jacks, who has the cure for Luke's polonium 210 poisoning, despite Luke's concerns for her safety and the danger of the task. Tracy eventually discovers a note from Luke, who has left without her, citing his need to protect her and complete the task alone.

• Lulu reveals to Laura and Nikolas that she and Dante are having a baby girl, and Nikolas is overjoyed. However, Lulu also shares a dark secret: Stavros forced her to marry him and tried to consummate the marriage, but she refused, and as a result, Stavros had Nikolas shot.

• Carly is blackmailed by Franco into letting Morgan stay with him and Ava, who claim that Franco has changed and is a good influence on Morgan. Meanwhile, Ava and Franco discuss their plan, with Ava denying any involvement in the shooting, but Franco expressing his suspicions that Ava might have been the second shooter.

• Alexis gives Shawn an ultimatum: quit working for Sonny or end their relationship. Shawn initially resists but eventually agrees to quit, and the two share a moment, but the outcome is uncertain. Meanwhile, AJ tries to make amends with Elizabeth after she discovers his infidelity with Carly, but Nikolas's presence and AJ's own insecurities threaten to derail their reconciliation.</summary>

<summary>
• Patrick is exposed to the AIDS virus after pricking himself during a procedure and is advised to take post-exposure prophylaxes (PEP) and get tested for HIV and Hepatitis B and C.
• Sonny has a therapy session with Dr. Lainey, who suggests that his mother's fault for not protecting him from his abusive stepfather, leading to a heated argument with Emily.
• Nikolas thanks Alfred for trying to set him up with Emily, but Nikolas believes it's not fair to Emily due to their complicated past.
• Sam is accused of stealing a file that connects Jason to the Escobars, but she denies it and claims she's not motivated to protect Jason after their breakup.
• Lucky reveals to Elizabeth that he didn't kill Manny, but rather Jason did, and he's been living a lie as a hero.
• Carly talks to Sonny about his childhood abuse and how his mother didn't protect him, leading Sonny to question his feelings towards his mother.
• Patrick starts taking anti-retroviral medication and prepares for the possibility of being infected with HIV, with Robin's support and guidance.
• Jason helps Sam study for her GED test while they're stuck in an elevator, and they share a moment of intimacy and longing for each other.
</summary>

<summary>
• Sam McCall leaves a message for Dr. Finn, asking him to call her back with her test results as soon as possible, as it will affect her decisions.
• Elizabeth Webber runs into Sam and asks if everything is okay, and Sam reveals that Jason Morgan might have contracted malaria in Greece.
• Ava Jerome is visited by Holt, who is concerned about her well-being after a reported shouting incident at her place, and Ava reveals that she is not involved in the Jerome family business anymore.
• Julian Jerome is visited by his attorney, Scott Baldwin, and later by Alexis Davis, who wants him to speak to the Bar Association on her behalf to help her avoid being disbarred.
• Kristina Davis and Aaron have a heart-to-heart conversation about her infidelity and her feelings for Parker, and Aaron is hurt but tries to be understanding.
• Sam confides in Elizabeth that she is pregnant and asks her to keep it a secret from Jason until she knows the baby is okay, as she is worried about passing on malaria to the child.
• Laura Spencer talks to Ava about her son Nikolas and how she is struggling to come to terms with his death, and Ava reveals that Nikolas died a hero, saving her life.
• Julian is offered a chance to escape from prison, and he is taken away by a guard, who reveals that Holt is waiting for him outside.
• Jordan Ashford and André share a romantic moment, and Jordan gives him a key to her place, symbolizing a new level of commitment in their relationship.
• Sam receives her test results and is told to meet with Dr. Finn in person, which she finds ominous, and Elizabeth offers to accompany her to the meeting.
</summary>

<summary>
• Sonny comforts Alexis after she becomes ill, and he later presses her to reveal what's really going on, suspecting she's hiding something.
• Lucky confesses to Nikolas and Emily that he's been having an affair with Maxie, and Elizabeth walked out on him after discovering the truth.
• Elizabeth seeks comfort from Jason, revealing that Lucky cheated on her with Maxie, and Jason shares that Sam slept with Ric.
• Sam confronts Ric about their encounter, accusing him of using her to get revenge on Jason, and Ric denies her claims.
• Lulu tells Dillon she's leaving Port Charles, and Dillon is skeptical of her reasons, thinking she's trying to find her father, Luke.
• Alexis confides in Sonny about her marital problems with Ric, and Sonny advises her to communicate her needs to Ric.
• Ric tells Sonny about his encounter with Sam, and Sonny is furious, realizing Ric's actions were motivated by a desire to hurt Jason.
• Elizabeth and Jason grow closer, and they share a romantic moment, but Elizabeth knows it can only be a one-time thing.
• Sonny confronts Ric about his actions, telling him he needs to take care of his family and stop chasing after Jason and Sonny.
• The episode ends with Elizabeth considering staying with Jason, and the two share a romantic moment as the song "I Give Myself Away" plays in the background.
</summary>

<summary>
• TJ is in trouble and needs Molly's help, as he has messed up Sonny and Carly's wedding cake.
• Sonny and Carly are preparing for their wedding day, but Carly is worried about Morgan, who may be bipolar.
• Michael is struggling with his feelings towards Sonny, who killed his father, and is unsure if he should attend the wedding.
• Morgan is dealing with the aftermath of his breakup with Kiki and is feeling guilty and ashamed.
• Nikolas and Hayden are discussing their past and Nikolas's son Spencer is trying to win back Emma.
• Anna returns to Port Charles and visits Patrick and Emma, bringing a gift for Emma.
• Sam and Anna discuss a case involving Nikolas and Anna agrees to help Sam by talking to Kyle Sloane.
• Carly and Jason discuss Morgan's possible bipolar disorder and Carly's concerns about the wedding.
• Morgan and Sonny have a heart-to-heart conversation about Morgan's behavior and Sonny's own struggles with bipolar disorder.
• The episode ends with TJ being confronted by an unknown person, and Anna seeking Kyle's help, while Michael considers attending the wedding for Morgan's sake.
</summary>

<summary>
* Sonny Corinthos is shot and critically injured by an unknown assailant, leaving his wedding to Carly in jeopardy, while Jason and Sam try to save his life and figure out who was behind the shooting.
* Meanwhile, Nikolas Cassadine is dealing with his own secrets and lies, as Hayden tries to uncover the truth about Jake's identity and Nikolas's involvement in the mystery.
* Anna Devane is torn between her duty as a cop and her feelings for Sloane, who has been working for Nikolas and has been involved in some shady dealings, including tampering with the mayoral election.
* Carly is waiting anxiously for Sonny to arrive at their wedding, unaware of the danger he is in, and is trying to stay positive and focused on their special day, surrounded by their friends and family.</summary>

<summary>
• Franco is declared not guilty due to his tumor, which affected his ability to tell right from wrong, and is released from custody. He returns to the Quartermaine mansion, where he reveals to Tracy and Ava that he poisoned the relish, and then kicks Ava out of the house.
• Britt gives birth to her baby at Wyndemere, but the baby has fluid in his lungs and needs immediate medical attention. Sabrina delivers the baby and takes him to the hospital, where he receives treatment and recovers.
• Sonny is found by Morgan and Michael after he left a note saying goodbye, and they convince him to return home. Olivia takes care of Sonny and makes sure he takes his medication.
• Morgan confesses to Sonny that he feels guilty for Connie's death, but Sonny reassures him that it's not his fault. Morgan also tells Sonny that Kiki will leave him if she finds out that he knew Franco wasn't her father.
• Kiki visits Franco at the Quartermaine mansion, but Carly and Tracy are also there, and Carly denies having any romantic feelings for Franco. Tracy tells Ava that she has an hour to pack her bags and leave the mansion.
• TJ and Molly reunite, and Taylor is left alone, plotting her next move. Britt is reunited with her baby at the hospital, and Silas is shown to be a kind and caring person, which surprises Sam.</summary>

<summary>
• The scene opens with EMTs and doctors rushing to treat patients affected by a pathogen, while others search for an antidote and try to defuse a bomb rigged to the antiserum by Jerry Jacks.
• Tracy Quartermaine's blood is used to create an antidote, but there's only one dose available, leading to a dispute over who should receive it, with Tracy wanting it to go to her father Edward, and Monica, the chief of staff, insisting on following federal guidelines.
• Meanwhile, Jax tries to reason with his brother Jerry, who is dying from radiation poisoning, and Sonny attempts to stop Jerry from blowing up the antiserum, leading to a confrontation and a shootout.
• The episode ends with Tracy reflecting on her father's life, Patrick's daughter Emma receiving the antidote, and Dante and Lulu preparing for the worst as the bomb's timer counts down, while McBain tries to defuse it and Jerry's fate is left uncertain.</summary>

<summary>
* Paul Hornsby has just finalized his divorce and is struggling to cope with the end of his marriage, but he puts on a brave face to help his son Dillon with a problem involving a "cease and desist" order on his movie production.
* Ava Jerome is frantic because the flash drive containing a recording that could clear her name has gone missing, and she demands that Scott Baldwin find it for her in exchange for the $5 million she owes him.
* Morgan Corinthos is determined to kill Julian Jerome, who he believes shot his father Sonny, and he sets out to track him down, despite his family's efforts to stop him.
* Michael Corinthos tries to find Morgan and prevent him from doing something reckless, while Carly Corinthos tries to keep Sonny calm and focused on his recovery.
* Patrick Drake celebrates his birthday with his loved ones, including his wife Sam and their children, and he proposes to Sam, wanting to spend the rest of his life with her.
* Kristina Davis is worried about her mother Alexis, who is with Julian and may be in danger, and she tries to reach her to warn her about Morgan's intentions.
* Paul Hornsby uses his past connection with Mayor Janice Lomax to get the "cease and desist" order lifted, and he offers to help Ava with her problem, but his motives are unclear.</summary>

<summary>
* Sonny and Kate's wedding is about to start, but Kristina, Sonny's daughter, is missing and her husband Trey is looking for her.
* Elizabeth reveals to Jason that she lied about the DNA test results, and Sam's baby is actually alive and living with Téa in Llanview.
* Olivia tries to warn Sonny that Kate is not herself and may be reverting to her alter ego Connie, but her warnings are dismissed.
* Joe Jr., Trey's father, has kidnapped Kristina and is planning to use her as leverage to get revenge on Sonny.
* As the wedding ceremony begins, Olivia tries to object, but is cut off by the judge.
* Just as the ceremony is about to proceed, Connie reveals that she has an objection and announces that she cannot marry Sonny because she is already married.
* The identity of Connie's husband is not revealed, but it is clear that this is a major twist in the wedding plans.
* Meanwhile, Jason and McBain discuss the revelation about Sam's baby, and McBain expresses concerns about how Téa will react to the news that the baby she has been raising is not her own.
</summary>

<summary>
* Claudia Zacchara is set to marry Sonny Corinthos as part of a business deal between their families, despite her brother Johnny's disapproval and concerns for her safety. Meanwhile, Jason Morgan is dealing with the aftermath of a warehouse fire and the shooting of three men, and is eventually arrested by Harper.
* Other storylines include Nikolas Cassadine's conflict with Jax over the development of Spoon Island, Carly's attempts to mediate between them, and Elizabeth and Sam's trip to a cabin with the boys, which takes a turn when they discover the Russians are outside and they are cut off from communication.</summary>

<summary>
• Jason is preparing to meet Franco, a famous artist who has been sending him cryptic messages and clues, despite Sam's warnings that it could be a trap.
• Carly is determined to reveal the truth about Claudia's death to the police, but Sonny is adamant that they should stick to their original story to protect Michael.
• Dominic is investigating a tagger who has been leaving a distinctive symbol at crime scenes, and he enlists Lulu's help to track down the tagger's identity.
• Rebecca is recovering from her accident and is being visited by Steve Webber, Elizabeth's brother, who is trying to mediate a truce between Rebecca and Elizabeth.
• Johnny is struggling with his feelings for Olivia, who has confessed that she is in love with Sonny, and he is torn between his desire for her and his pride.
• Maxie is trying to downplay her encounter with Franco and is asking Sam to help her get in touch with Jason to ask him to mention her to Franco about a photo shoot.
• Nikolas is trying to apologize to Rebecca for his behavior, but she is not interested in his apologies and is instead plotting her revenge with Ethan's help.
• Franco finally meets Jason at his studio, and the two begin a tense and awkward conversation, with Franco trying to establish a connection with Jason and Jason trying to figure out what Franco wants from him.
</summary>

<summary>
• Maxie is struggling to cope with the loss of custody of her daughter, and her friend Robin tries to offer her support and guidance. Meanwhile, Spinelli is considering moving to Portland with his girlfriend Ellie and taking Maxie's daughter with them, which Maxie seems to be okay with, but Robin is concerned about.
• Lulu is grieving the loss of her daughter and is angry with her husband Dante, whom she blames for their loss. Carly tries to offer her support and encourages her to talk to Dante and work through their issues. Dante is also struggling to cope with the loss and feels guilty for not backing Lulu up in court.
• Franco confides in Dr. Kevin Collins about killing his mother, Heather Webber, and Kevin agrees to take him on as a client. Franco is struggling to come to terms with his past actions and is worried that he may still be a danger to himself and others.
• Lucy confesses to Kevin that she slept with Scott, but Kevin forgives her and they reaffirm their commitment to each other and their marriage. Meanwhile, Spinelli decides to move to Portland with Ellie and Maxie's daughter, and Dante tries to convince Lulu to try again and have another baby.</summary>

<summary>
• Alexis and Ric discuss their plans to cut down a Christmas tree, but Ric is hesitant and would rather buy one from a lot. Alexis insists on continuing the family tradition of cutting down a tree in the woods where Molly was conceived.
• Carly is determined to leave Roselawn and return home to her children for Christmas, but Dr. Kim and Lainey are opposed to the idea, citing her emotional instability and lack of progress in her treatment.
• Nikolas apologizes to Courtney and Nikolas for his behavior and suggests they resolve their differences in a more civilized manner. Courtney plans to visit Carly at Roselawn and later spends time with Nikolas, who gives Lulu a Christmas present.
• Sonny receives news that Carly won't be able to come home for Christmas, and Michael is disappointed. Emily offers to help decorate the Christmas tree and spend the holiday with Sonny and the boys.
• Alexis is appointed to defend Manny Ruiz, despite her initial reluctance and personal connection to the case. She visits Manny in the hospital and discovers that his violent behavior may have been caused by a brain anomaly, which could be a mitigating factor in his trial.
• Carly opens up to Lainey about her regrets as a mother and her fears that Emily is taking her place in the boys' lives. Lainey encourages Carly to focus on her strengths and work towards a full recovery.
• The episode ends with Sonny, Emily, and the boys decorating the Christmas tree and enjoying quality time together, while Carly looks on from Roselawn, feeling left out and determined to make a change.</summary>

<summary>
* Gus is shocked to discover he has a 16-year-old son, Rafe, with Natalia, and struggles to process the news.
* Beth tries to assert her independence from Alan, who is becoming increasingly controlling and obsessive about their unborn child.
* Reva confronts Alan about a bounced check he wrote for cancer research, accusing him of stealing from cancer patients.
* Rick and Mel discuss their daughter Leah's adjustment to the news of her father's new child with Beth, and Rick's determination to fight for custody.
* Natalia explains to Gus why she kept their son a secret, citing fear and uncertainty about Gus's whereabouts and feelings.
* Harley tries to mediate between Gus and Natalia, while also dealing with her own concerns about Gus's reaction to the news.
* Beth plans a trip to Paris to visit her friend Mindy, but Alan is suspicious and controlling, leading to tension in their relationship.
* The scene ends with Natalia searching for her son Rafe, who has been taken to a holding cell at the police station, and Gus struggling to come to terms with his new role as a father.</summary>

<summary>
• The scene opens with Lizzie revealing to Ava that she knows Ava went to a fertility clinic, and Ava tells Bill to get out after he tries to convince her to stay and make their marriage work. Meanwhile, Beth breaks the news to Rick that she's chosen Alan over him, and Rick decides to cancel the annual Bauer barbecue.

• Cassie and Josh decide to host the barbecue at their place instead, and they start preparing for the party. Lizzie, Alan, and Beth plan to have a picnic at the lighthouse, but Lizzie later changes her mind and decides to go to the barbecue.

• Ava's secret about the baby is revealed to Remy, who confronts her about it. Bill tries to convince Lizzie to have an affair with him, but she rejects him. Ava and Bill attend the barbecue, where Ava tries to put on a happy face despite her troubles.

• Rick eventually shows up at the barbecue and is persuaded by Beth to take his place at the grill. The partygoers enjoy the food and festivities, and Mallet gives a speech about the importance of the Fourth of July and the connections that bring people together.

• The episode ends with a preview of upcoming storylines, including Reva's unengagement to Jeffrey, Mark's confession of love to Cassie, and Cassie's assertion that she's still with Josh.</summary>

<summary>
* Cassie and Jeffrey discuss their relationship and a party for RJ, while Edmund tries to cause tension between them by offering to supervise RJ's party and making comments about Jeffrey's commitment issues.
* Dinah tries to manipulate Edmund into sleeping with her by threatening to turn him in for kidnapping her, but Edmund is hesitant and only agrees to consider it.
* Reva discovers that Nate, Jonathan's adoptive father, is in town and is likely responsible for the death of Olivia's sister, and she and Olivia start to investigate and plan their next move.
* Jonathan's behavior becomes increasingly erratic and violent, causing tension with Tammy and Sandy, and Reva tries to intervene and calm him down.
* Bill tries to convince Dinah to participate in a family photo session with him and Olivia, but Dinah is hesitant and feels like she doesn't belong.
* Reva decides to take a job at the local bar, which is owned by Nate, in order to gather more information and get closer to him, and Nate agrees to hire her back.</summary>

<summary>
* Alan Spaulding confesses to shooting his son Phillip, but later tries to retract his statement and blame Harley for the crime. However, Alexandra reveals that she has a pair of gloves with powder burns and Phillip's blood on them, which links Alan to the crime.
* Edmund is devastated by the news that Dinah lost their baby, and Dinah tries to convince him to start a new family with her. However, Edmund still wants to be with Cassie and tries to convince her to start over with him.
* Cassie refuses to take Edmund back and instead suggests that they find a way to co-parent their unborn child. Edmund becomes emotional and reveals that he has something important to tell Cassie, but is interrupted by a phone call.
* Tammy tries to win Sandy back after he starts talking to another woman, April. Meanwhile, Jonathan tries to comfort Dinah after her miscarriage and advises her to stop caring about Edmund before it's too late.
* The police arrive and arrest Alan for Phillip's murder, and Frank takes Harley away to clear her name. The episode ends with a cliffhanger as Olivia accuses Jonathan of knowing something about her sister's death, and Reva vows to prove that Jonathan killed her.</summary>

<summary>
• Shayne is struggling with his newfound celebrity status and the constant attention from reporters and fans, but finds comfort in being around his friends and Marina.
• Ben is desperate to visit his dying grandmother, but is being held back by Mel and the police, who are still investigating the murder and suspect Ben may be involved.
• Cassie evicts Jeffrey O'Neill from the Beacon Hotel after he makes disparaging comments about Tammy and her friends, and refuses to reconsider despite his attempts to apologize.
• Edmund seeks Alexandra's help in making a dream of Cassie's come true, but she has her own agenda and wants Edmund to help her take down Jeffrey O'Neill.
• Gus confronts Eden about her possible involvement in the murders, but she denies any wrongdoing and claims she is being framed.
• Ben remembers a crucial detail about his attack, including the scent of a specific aftershave, which leads Gus to suspect Mitch Hendon.
• Mitch is confronted by Ross and agrees to turn himself in, but not before making a call to Ramona's family to break the news.
• Marina defends Ben to a reporter, claiming he is not a killer, and Shayne signs an autograph for the reporter's "nephew".
• Jeffrey makes a mysterious phone call, asking for a pickup and referencing "merchandise" that needs to be handled with care.
• Cassie checks on the progress of moving Jeffrey's belongings out of the hotel, while Eden and Tony discuss their plan to clear her name and find the real killer.
</summary>

<summary>
* The scene revolves around a charity fundraiser event hosted by the Spaulding family, where various characters interact and relationships are explored. Meanwhile, Cyrus Foley is secretly embezzling money from the donations, using a system to transmit the funds to an accomplice, Griggs.
* As the night progresses, tensions rise as characters confront each other about their past and present relationships, including Marina and Cyrus's complicated history, Gus and Natalia's growing connection, and Dinah's confession of feelings to Matt, while Mallet faces trouble with his job due to financial struggles and a misunderstanding with his boss, Frank.</summary>

<summary>
* Lizzie is recovering in the hospital after being kidnapped, and Bill is trying to clear his name as the main suspect. Meanwhile, Alan is trying to convince Beth to join him on a trip to China to save the Macau deal.
* Reva is worried about her son Shayne, who has gone missing after returning from a stint in the military. Josh tries to reassure her that Shayne can take care of himself, but Reva is still concerned.
* Shayne is actually with his friend Remy, who is trying to help him deal with his emotional pain. Shayne is struggling to come to terms with his past and his current situation.
* Beth is torn between her feelings for Coop and her obligations to her family. She confides in Buzz, who warns her about the dangers of getting involved with Alan's family.
* Josh finds Shayne and tries to convince him to seek medical help, but Shayne is resistant. Josh also reveals that Shayne's prior car accident may be affecting his current condition.
* Lizzie decides to go to China to save the Macau deal, despite Bill's objections. Bill gives her a Christmas gift and promises to follow a lead to clear his name.
* The episode ends with Shayne booking a flight to leave town, and Reva and Jeffrey discussing their concerns about Shayne's well-being and Reva's pregnancy.</summary>

<summary>
• Blair returns to Llanview and reveals to Todd that she still has feelings for him, despite her initial claims of hatred, and that she wants to be with him.
• Todd is hesitant to trust Blair's feelings, given their complicated past, but eventually opens up and tells her that he loves her, and Blair forgives him for his past mistakes.
• Max tries to convince Roxy to give their marriage another chance, but she is skeptical and ultimately decides to divorce him, citing that he will never love her the way she wants.
• Asa's plan to divorce Rae is foiled when she reveals that she has signed the divorce papers, but only because she wants to renegotiate the terms of their settlement.
• Antonio confronts Liz about her plans to take the baby and leave town, and she admits that she is trying to avoid facing the truth about the baby's paternity.
• Jen confides in Marcie about her feelings of guilt and shame over her role in Cristian's imprisonment, and Marcie suggests that she tell Cristian the truth and apologize.
• Gabrielle and Al discuss their respective relationships, with Gabrielle expressing her feelings of loneliness despite being in a relationship with Bo, and Al revealing that Max wants to stay with Roxy.
• The episode ends with a cliffhanger, as Natalie reveals that she has to sleep with Mitch Laurence, and Cristian and Antonio discuss ways to keep Laurence away from Natalie.</summary>

<summary>
• The scene revolves around Chloe's christening, where Jessica, Natalie, and Jared come together to celebrate the occasion, while also dealing with their own personal struggles and secrets, including the truth about Jessica's baby's death and the identity of the baby's real parents, Starr and Cole.
• Meanwhile, the investigation into the serial killer case continues, with Nora and Bo discovering a knife with Blair's blood on it, and a partial fingerprint that belongs to John McBain, leading to a shocking twist in the case, while Todd tries to manipulate Téa into helping him get custody of his kids, and Cole and Starr try to uncover the truth about their baby's death.</summary>

<summary>
• Todd Manning is in the hospital after being attacked by Cole, and Dani is struggling with her feelings towards him, unsure if she can trust him or believe his claims of innocence in the incident with Marty Saybrooke. Meanwhile, Téa is determined to defend Todd and prove his innocence, despite Blair's warnings that she is making a huge mistake.

• Langston reveals to Markko that she has been cheating on him with Ford, and Markko is devastated by the news. Meanwhile, Rex receives a call from a silversmith in Santa Fe who recognizes the necklace that Rex's mother left for him, and Rex decides to travel to Santa Fe to learn more about his past.

• Jessica is preparing for the prom with Brody, while Natalie is still reeling from John's accusations that she was involved in Marty's attack. Brody is determined to help Jessica remember their past and rekindle their romance, and Natalie is trying to come to terms with her feelings towards John and the situation with Marty.</summary>

<summary>
• Natalie and Paul are together, but Natalie's mind is elsewhere, and she receives a call from John, who is trying to move on from his past and wants to see her.
• Meanwhile, Viki is in the hospital after having a coronary, and her family is by her side, relieved that she is going to be okay.
• Marcie decides to take matters into her own hands and sneaks into Dr. Long's office to gather evidence, despite Michael's warnings.
• Dr. Long is questioned by John, but he denies any wrongdoing and claims that the documents proving the legitimacy of the organs being harvested are real.
• Nora and Daniel discuss Dr. Long's case, and Daniel apologizes for standing Nora up on a date, explaining that he was too engrossed in the file on Dr. Long.
• Kelly is found passed out after taking sleeping pills, and Paul is accused by David of trying to hurt her, but Paul denies it and claims that Kelly is out of her mind because of her own fears and paranoia.</summary>

<summary>
• Blair and John discuss Todd's disappearance and their suspicions about Miles Laurence, who they believe may be involved. They play a recording of a baby crying, which Miles claims means nothing to him, but Blair and John are skeptical.
• Meanwhile, Jessica confesses to Antonio that she's in love with Nash, and Antonio is devastated. Cristian reveals that he knew about Jessica and Nash's relationship but didn't tell Antonio because he was trying to protect him.
